item.title: First Western Financial Inc 10-K
item.description: First Western Financial Inc, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 15, 2022 had 51226 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 566 instances 31 - 562 instances loans - 562 instances december - 542 instances financial - 480 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
